directions: Cook onion and garlic in oil in a large nonstick skillet over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened. Add tomato and chick-peas and cook, stirring, 5 minutes. Add Swiss chard and cook, covered, until wilted, about 2 minutes. Add lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 pound Swiss chard, stems discarded and leaves coarsely chopped
title: Chick-Peas and Swiss Chard
